Research

My area of interest is Applied Mathematics in general. Currently I am interested in nonlinear dispersive partial differential equations, harmonic analysis, and signal processing.

My advisors are Prof. Frank Baginski and Prof. Svetlana Roudenko.

Publications

  • Global well-posedness for low regularity data in the 2d modified Zakharov-Kuznetsov equation with Luiz Gustovo Farah and Svetlana Roudenko (Submitted) link
  • Generalized ForWaRD algorithm for multi-antenna model (In preparation)
